Author: ISBbaby
Text: I wouldn't disclose the specifics at all, but if the culture and vibe is right and it would be appropriate, it wouldn't be a bad idea to acknowledge that you're having a hard time at the moment with personal stuff and to accept a little help. People are generally a lot more forgiving and sympathetic when they know you're dealing with shit and still trying, as opposed to thinking you're just being a bad employee or whatever.
